title: Hey, I was wondering about a small change to fiora which will help her against cc loaded fighters
body:
So she has general trouble against most opponents top lane, (jax, garen and daruis to name a few) and even if she has a loaded mage killing kit (lol) she tends to lose alot early game and become mediocre mid to late game if not fed.

This of course is my opinion and views and I may be wrong but based off them I propose the following:

Remove the % cd reduction on her q per hit and instead give her a "charge" like kha zix ult which lasts like 2 - 2.5 seconds if she hits a vital with her q (does not go on cooldown during this time) , this can happen up to 2 times  yet consecutive q's deal % something less damage for each extra q (not with her ult either because that is stupid, we would be giving her the heal and execute damage on a silver platter).

There are holes in this and adjustments would be needed to be made across her kit (or just adjust the q a little more so she still benefits from using it when she ults or does not hit a vital on a champ, like when farming) but I felt a little more repositioning in a fight means she is not so vulnerable once she uses her q which will likely result in getting focused down and killed in her current iteration.

Discuss
